organic.title: Re: How do I know the “latest” patch has been downloaded?
organic.snippet: You can check the patch version by hitting the Guide button on your controller and selecting the NHL 24 tile. Then, hit the Menu button.

sitelinks.title: You can check the patch version by hitting the Guide button on your controller and selecting the NHL 24 tile. Then, hit the Menu button.
